Dossier ontology documentation generator and maven plugin
Last Published: 2014-10-04  | Version: 0.1.0

Usage

The main use of dossier is to generate ontology diagrams to be packaged into site documentation. A typical usage is:

<build>
  ...
  <plugins>
    ...
    <plugin>
      <groupId>org.charvolant</groupId>
      <artifactId>dossier-maven-plugin</artifactId>
      <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
      <configuration>
        <ontologies>
          <directory>src/main/resources/org/charvolant/dossier</directory>
          <includes>
            <include>*.owl</include>
          </includes>
        </ontologies>
      </configuration>
      <executions>
        <execution>
          <goals>
            <goal>document</goal>
          </goals>
          <phase>site</phase>
        </execution>
      </executions>
     </plugin>
     ...
  </plugins>
  ...
</build>
